document.discussion_title: CREO announces genuine parts for first ‘Make in India’ smartphone
document.topic_text: CREO announces genuine parts for first ‘Make in India’ smartphone April 25th, 2016 CanIndia New Wire Service 0 comments 1 New Delhi, April 25 (IANS) Consumer technology company CREO on Monday announced the prices of genuine spare parts for its first ‘Make in India” smartphone “Mark 1.” “It is imperative for us to provide a seamless after-sale services to CREO ‘Mark 1’ users. We have announced the price list for ‘Mark 1’ spare parts. Going further, we also plan to extend the service to 300 centres across India,” Sai Srinivas, CEO and co-founder, CREO, said in a statement. The Rs.19,999 4G-enabled device runs on an indigenously-made Android operating system “FUEL OS”. The metal body device is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass 3 on both sides with 2.5D curves. It is powered by 1.95 GHz True Quad Core Helio X10 processor with 3GB RAM and 3100mAh battery. “Mark 1” has a 32GB on-board memory which can be expanded upto 128GB and supports duel SIM. The company has also announced one complimentary cover for every new user buying the phone from the official website. The detailed price list of the device’s spare parts can be found at the website www.creosense.com. The flagship device is currently on sale on the CREO website and via e-tailer Flipkart from April 19. –IANS
